data.name: Good Music
data.description:
Good Music allows you to bring your real world music listening experience into VR whilst enjoying colourful visualisations. The experience transports you to a magical universe where you can discover new life forms that use the energy from your music to grow, multiply, move around and thrive. You can take photos of the artificial wildlife you discover amongst the mesmerising vistas, and share with friends.

Recording Audio.
The app requires permission to record ambient audio in order to function. For your privacy and peace of mind, this ambient sound information is immediately discarded milliseconds after it is read and the app does not not store, transmit or reproduce ambient audio information to deliver this experience.

changelog.change_log: Let the music you listen to come to life in this unique experience through a magical universe. This is a not-for-profit musical experiment. Your encouragement means a lot to us.
